body: 请问一下，多表联动是如何实现的呢？可以在[gallery](https://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html)提供一个简单的可复现demo吗？
我是将事件绑定到了axis上，所以希望点击轴线能被myChart.on('click',function (param) {  } 这个方法监听到。

Hi! We've received your issue and please be patient to get responded. 🎉
The average response time is expected to be within one day for weekdays.

In the meanwhile, please make sure that **you have posted enough image to demo your request**. You may also check out the [API](http://echarts.apache.org/api.html) and [chart option](http://echarts.apache.org/option.html) to get the answer.

If you don't get helped for a long time (over a week) or have an urgent question to ask, you may also send an email to dev@echarts.apache.org. Please attach the issue link if it's a technical questions.

If you are interested in the project, you may also subscribe our [mail list](https://echarts.apache.org/en/maillist.html).

Have a nice day! 🍵

Hi! We've received your issue and please be patient to get responded. 🎉
The average response time is expected to be within one day for weekdays.

In the meanwhile, please make sure that **you have posted enough image to demo your request**. You may also check out the [API](http://echarts.apache.org/api.html) and [chart option](http://echarts.apache.org/option.html) to get the answer.

@hejun200613224 Thanks for pointing out, Could you make a PR for this?
Please also consider option with mix-blend-mode as addition alternative for selection area color. In some cases this feature allows to solve design problems without being a designer.

Yeah, I did. Please check it
https://github.com/apache/incubator-echarts-doc/pull/93

1. remove min max calculation logic with axis.scale.getExtent()
2. moved cases to bar-polar-stack.html
3. add more cases
Did you set correct user.name and user.email?

> Did you set correct user.name and user.email?

Sorry, not quite sure of the problem.
I mean the user.name and user.email of you git. It seems like you didn't use your github account to push commit
Thanks for your contribution. I've merged the PR. The document on the Website will be updated later.

@MarcSkovMadsen Thanks for your contribution. That seems really cool! 🎊 
I've retweeted using ECharts's account. 
You may also consider adding it to [awesome-echarts](https://github.com/ecomfe/awesome-echarts) once the PR has been merged.
Thanks!
@a521king Please provide a demo for the issue either with https://jsfiddle.net/ovilia/n6xc4df3/ or https://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html.
如果「汇聚」，从数据结构上来说，这个就不是「树」了，所以建议使用 `graph` 实现。

https://echarts.apache.org/examples/zh/editor.html?c=dynamic-data2 
这个例子的动态数据是不卡的，所以还是检查自己 vue 相关框架的原因。
This is not a bower project.

any progress? @Ovilia ?
如果没有配置项那应该就是不支持，有兴趣的话可以尝试自己解决下？
Have been merged in git.

Similar to #12227. The treemap case is fixed in #12471. But sunburst not fixed yet.
I think sunburst should also use "beforeLink data.wrapMethod('getItemModel', ...)" to inject "LevelModel", rather than do it in `tree.getModel`.
After sunburst fixed, the `level` info (e.g., `levelOptions`, `getLevelModel`) should be removed from `Tree.js`.

The `emphasis.format.label` problem is fixed in #12471.
The hover bug is not fixed yet.
把最简单的代码在这里贴一下

没有接口，但是可以自己计算得到。先计算出绘图区域的宽度，就是 `grid.width` 或者如果没有设的话，看文档默认值是 canvas 宽度减去 `grid.left` 和 `grid.right`。然后除以有多少组数据，这个宽度的 https://echarts.apache.org/zh/option.html#series-bar.barWidth （默认 60%），也就是说间隙是 40%。

> 如果没有配置项那应该就是不支持，有兴趣的话可以尝试自己解决下？

@susiwen8 你好，请问自己尝试解决的方式是？我的需求是做成一般滑块的样式，不需要矩形外边的三角形
@Jazxc 我的意思是你可以尝试改源码，提个PR

Hi! We've received your issue and please be patient to get responded. 🎉
The average response time is expected to be within one day for weekdays.

In the meanwhile, please make sure that **you have posted enough image to demo your request**. You may also check out the [API](http://echarts.apache.org/api.html) and [chart option](http://echarts.apache.org/option.html) to get the answer.

If you don't get helped for a long time (over a week) or have an urgent question to ask, you may also send an email to dev@echarts.apache.org. Please attach the issue link if it's a technical questions.

If you are interested in the project, you may also subscribe our [mail list](https://echarts.apache.org/en/maillist.html).
